Summary: large red/orange light moving slowly in my direction
divs: sighting detailsoutside watching fireworks. looked away from fireworks for a second or so then turned back toward the same sw direction and noticed very large red\orange ball shaped object with hazy outline heading straight toward me. no idea about identification but first impression was a stray bit of fireworks but speed was too slow and it had a flight path. object was way too bright to be a plane\planet or anything that i had ever seen. was moving at a steady pace\not very fast and about the altitude of a small plane. appeared to possibly be pulsating but not sure about that. it then took a wide left turn, maintaining the same speed. once this was accomplished, it began to fade in and out then quickly disappeared from site.
